title: Relationships
description: A list of relationships between this entity (subject) and various other entities (objects)

predicate.title: Predicate
predicate.description: The predicate of the relationship (e.g. 'is a member of ___', 'has a selection of ___', 'knows ___ for 10 years', 'trust ___ to hold a copy of my keys', etc.)

object_url.title: Object URL
object_url.description: The URL (starting with http:// or https://) that links to the receiving entity of the relationship described by the predicate, and is ideally its Primary URL

description.title: Description
description.description: A short description of the relationship in a full sentence (e.g. 'We (our.org) have known Alice for 10 years.')

metadata.purpose: Relationships describe the links between the subject entity (i.e., the entity publishing these relationships within its Murmurations profile) and various other entities, describing the relationships in a human-readable way. The object_url should be the Primary URL of the receiving entity (e.g., https://alice.org), and the predicate should describe the relationship the subject has with that entity (e.g. 'trust Alice to hold a copy of my house keys'). An optional description field can describe the relationship in a complete sentence (e.g., 'I (Bob) trust Alice to hold a copy of my house keys.').
